019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Objects;
023import java.util.Optional;
024import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
025import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpChangeMedium;
026import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpOpenTray;
027import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.commands.QmpRemoveMedium;
028import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.ConfigureQemu;
029import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorCommand;
030import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.MonitorResult;
031import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
032import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.TrayMovedEvent;
033import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
034import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
035import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
036
037/**
038 * The Class CdMediaController.
039 */
040@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
041public class CdMediaController extends Component {
042
043    /**
044     * The Enum TrayState.
045     */
046    public enum TrayState {
047        OPEN, CLOSED
048    }
049
050    private final Map<String, TrayState> trayState = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
051    private final Map<String, String> current = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
052    private final Map<String, String> pending = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
053
054    /**
055     * Instantiates a new cdrom controller.
056     *
057     * @param componentChannel the component channel
058     * @param monitor the monitor
059     */
060    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AssignmentToNonFinalStatic")
061    public CdMediaController(Channel componentChannel) {
062        super(componentChannel);
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * On configure qemu.
067     *
068     * @param event the event
069     */
070    @Handler
071    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
072        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
073    public void onConfigureQemu(ConfigureQemu event) {
074
075        int cdCounter = 0;
076        var drives = event.configuration().vm.drives;
077        for (int i = 0; i < drives.length; i++) {
078            if (!"ide-cd".equals(drives[i].type)) {
079                continue;
080            }
081            var driveId = "cd" + cdCounter++;
082            var newFile = Optional.ofNullable(drives[i].file).orElse("");
083            if (event.state() == State.STARTING) {
084                current.put(driveId, newFile);
085                continue;
086            }
087            if (!Objects.equals(current.get(driveId), newFile)) {
088                pending.put(driveId, newFile);
089                if (trayState.computeIfAbsent(driveId,
090                    k -> TrayState.CLOSED) == TrayState.CLOSED) {
091                    fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpOpenTray(driveId)));
092                    continue;
093                }
094                changeMedium(driveId);
095            }
096        }
097
098    }
099
100    private void changeMedium(String driveId) {
101        current.put(driveId, pending.get(driveId));
102        if (pending.get(driveId).isEmpty()) {
103            fire(new MonitorCommand(new QmpRemoveMedium(driveId)));
104        } else {
105            fire(new MonitorCommand(
106                new QmpChangeMedium(driveId, pending.get(driveId))));
107        }
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * On monitor event.
112     *
113     * @param event the event
114     */
115    @Handler
116    public void onTrayMovedEvent(TrayMovedEvent event) {
117        trayState.put(event.driveId(), event.state());
118        if (event.state() == TrayState.OPEN
119            && pending.containsKey(event.driveId())) {
120            changeMedium(event.driveId());
121        }
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * On monitor result.
126     *
127     * @param result the result
128     */
129    @Handler
130    public void onMonitorResult(MonitorResult result) {
131        if (result.executed() instanceof QmpOpenTray) {
132//            if (!result.executed().equals(changeMedium.get("execute").asText())
133//                    && !result.executed()
134//                        .equals(removeMedium.get("execute").asText())) {
135//                    return;
136//                }
137//                String drive = result.arguments().get("id").asText();
138//                String newFile = pending.get(drive);
139//                if (newFile == null) {
140//                    return;
141//                }
142//                if (result.successful()) {
143//                    fire(new MonitorCommandCompleted(CHANGE_MEDIUM, drive, newFile));
144//                    pending.remove(drive);
145//                }
146        }
147    }
148}
